111.content: Lan and Maylu were resting in Maylu's room while their Navis were in Lan's PET. Then, Maylu said, I'm getting really bored." Lan replied, "Me too." Maylu then asked him, "Shall we?" Maylu really enjoyed being tickled especially by Lan. Whenever Maylu is depressed or bored, Lan would tickle her and she would cheer up fast. Lan first decided to tickle Maylu's...
111.title: Tickle Date

1111.content:
Mayl lifted her arms behind her head. "You can start with my underarms. But be careful, they're super ticklish". She teased. Lan just shook his head with a smirk. He knew she didn't mean it. It was just her way of making sure he tickled her like she wanted. With that in mind, he jammed his hands in her armpits.

PFFT HAHAHAHA-KKHAHAHAHHAHA IHIHIHIHS THAHAHAHA ALL YOU GOHOHOHOHOT- HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA Despite her provoking, she just wanted him to make her laugh more. In response, he used one finger on each underarm, causing her to laugh harder and louder. BAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA THAHAHAHAHAHATS NOHOHOHOHOHOTHING HAHAHAHAHAHAHA-PFFT-HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA COHOHOHME ON MAHAHAHAKE ME LAAHAHAHAHAHAHAAUGH

Mayl was laughing hysterically but could still find the strength to provoke him. Despite it all, she was having fun. Only lan could make her laugh like this. Minutes of hysteria later, lan-
1111.title: Underarms

11111.content:
Mayl brought her arms down, laughing harder every second. Tears of joy flooded down her face as she enjoyed her playful torture. Silent laughter overtook her but she wanted him to keep going. Although, it would be hard to tell him that when she can't form a single word. Mayl was in heaven. Only lan could make her laugh this hard.

Minutes she finally summoned the strength to shout "OKOKOK HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHA MERCHCHCHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEY" Lan stopped and let mayl breathe. Bits of her hair stuck to her face and tears stained her face but her smile never went away. After she caught her breath, she gave him a knowing smile. "Not done yet huh"? Lan thought to himself. With that in mind-
11111.title: Tickled harder

111112.content:
Mayl was screaming and laughing with delight as her best friend drove her crazy with tickling. She hugged herself in a false attempt to guard herself out of reflex but she was enjoying herself. Tears fell endlessly and her throat started to burn from laughing so hard yet she never said to stop but at the same time, she wasn't sure she could. She tried to say anything to mess with lan but everything came out as either hysterical laughter or plain gibberish.

HHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA LAHAHAHANAYBEHBJWHFBWJHFGUYGAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA LJHWFUKHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA

Lan looked at her with concern."She's trying to tell me something but what"? Lan then stopped and let his friend catch her breath and talk clearly. "I needed a drink. My throat's killing me". Lan got the message and got her some water. After a few sips, she was slowly calming down, although a few coughs came out. "Are you ok"? "I'm fine, lan. That just tickled more than I thought".

A few minutes later, mayl was back to her old self. Suffice to say, she wasn't bored anymore. "So now what do you wanna do"? Lan asked. Mayl smiled and lied down with her hands behind her head. Lan just shook his head. "You weirdo". The rest of the day was filled with mayl's laughter.

GAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA IHIHIS THAHAHAHAHAHAT IT?

Guess she's still kinda bored...or is she?
111112.title: armpits again

1112.content: With a smile, Lan attacks her belly first. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA OHOHOHOHOHO NOHOHOHOHOH NOHOHOHOHOT MY BEHEHEHEHELLY HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA Mayl doubled over as her worst spot was playfully tortured. Tears of joy were streaming down her face as she howled uncontrollably. Lan smiled as he drove his friend wild with laughter. "Man, I almost forgot how sensitive she was on her stomach. Hope she doesn't punch me for this. She usually can't help it when I get her here". Mayl hugged herself but despite her most sensitive spot being tortured, she didn't try to stop him. She was enjoying herself and she wasn't feeling bored anymore. Soon-
1112.title: Mayl Belly fun

141.content: Lan was getting a knock on the door and since his parents were cruising, Maylu was shopping and Mega was in NetCity, Lan had to answer and was shocked when he did. "Hey Lan. Long time no see." Princess Pride was given a vacation and decided to stay in ACDC for a few days. "Pleasure to see you again." Lan replied. The princess took her shoes off at the door and the two headed up to Lan's room. Pride then asked, "I would ask for a battle but Knight Man is guarding the castle. So how about I tell you a little secret?" Lan nodded as Pride told him. " I actually enjoy being tickled. It helps me to relax the stress of being a princess." Lan asked, "Does anyone else know that?" Pride told him "Nope, and this is our little secret. Actually these last few days have been tiring. Would you do the honors?" Lan replied, "No problem." Lan first decided to tickle Pride's...
141.title: Pals with a Princess

1413.content: Lan started tickling the young princess's feet quickly yet gently and she collapsed into a giggling fit. "Hehehehehehe good hehe yehehehehehehes. vehehehehehery good hehehehe." Lan replied, "And it's only begun." He now tickled her harder and she giggled louder. "Hahahahahahahahaha yehehes mohohohohohore hahahahaha!" Lan now went to tickle her...
1413.title: Feet
